content:
@Lloyd McKenzie , is there a place where your template's requirements are documented. For example, the use of ImplementationGuide parameters, what the possible values are, etc.?
If not, I would suggest creating a section in the IG Publisher wiki pages.
Also consider documentation for how to use a locally defined template.

The above page is not complete, in that it doesn't include some of the parameters that were migrated from ig.ini to the IG parameters. For more on those, see the base template v0.0.2 release notes: https://github.com/HL7/ig-template-base/releases/tag/0.0.2

true, the template adds the need for a few more parameters - copyrightyear, releaselabel.
@Lloyd McKenzie should the template-specific needs go to the publisher's wiki page? Or somewhere else?
Is there a link for the most current information?
